title: What makes Riven cooler then your main?

replies.body:

I'm a ninja and here's my triumvurate.

What is an absol? Is that some kind of new drink evolution of absinthe? Like maybe pinesol and absinthe? You kids will do anything to get high these days wtf.

Absol is the best, especially with the super easy 100% crit chance.
Cooler you say? I think {{champion:34}}  Articuno might have a different opinion....

I see Absol, i must upvote. 

Absol is best pokemon. <3
